channel.title: When i jar my client it says conneting to port null
channel.description: ok i made a client and it works perfectly and connects to port 43594 automatically and connects to the server ip automatically but when i jar the server it connects to the correct ip automatically but not the right port..it connect to port : null after i jar the client....what is wrong or am i jarring it wrong.

item.title: When i jar my client it says conneting to port null
item.dc:creator: @bryan_cole1 bryan cole1
item.description:
@bryan_cole1 wrote:

you have to put your main class as it say in your run.bat or run client.bat if it say EGUI in main-class put EGUI or whatever it say look at my page and actually my Webclient works perfectly:
[url]http://pkerscape.net76.net/[url]

Read full topic
